value.title: AMD, Intel, AND NVIDIA, Announce New CPU, GPU And Automotive Processors At CES 2022
value.excerpt: Ranked Industry Analyst Patrick Moorhead dives into Intel, NVIDIA, and AMD processor innovations that were announced at CES 2022.

value.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Accelerates Manufacturing Homegrown Chips
value.excerpt: Microsoft (MSFT) hires key Apple engineer Mike Filippo to manufacture in-house processors for the servers running its cloud-computing services and Surface line of personal computers.

value.title: Samsung unveils new MRAM-based in-memory computing chip
value.excerpt: Samsung has just announced the successful creation of the world's first MRAM-based in-memory computing chip, made with A.I. computing in mind.

value.title: Chinese self-driving chip startup secures investment from Bosch
value.excerpt: Boyuan Capital, an investment arm of German car supplier Bosch, has invested an undisclosed sum into Chinese semiconductor startup Black Sesame, making its first bet on artificial intelligence chips for self-driving vehicles in China.

value.title: Enterprise Security at CES 2022 Marked by IoT, Biometrics, and PC Chips

value.title: Has AI found a treatment for Fragile X?
value.excerpt: What if AI can substantially speed it up? That's the premise of Quris, an artificial intelligence company hoping to disrupt the pharmaceutical arena. The company just announced the final close of $28 million in seed funding to support its clinical prediction platform.

value.title: How COVID broke supply chains, and how AI and blockchain could fix them

value.title: Seeing Machines launches partnership with AI firm Ambrella

value.title: Ambarella launches 16-core CV3 AI chip for autonomous vehicles

value.title: NVIDIA RTX 3090 Ti and RTX 3050 revealed to quench your GPU thirst
value.excerpt: With CES kicking off here in the first week of 2022, NVIDIA is joining in on the fun with a few announcements of its own. Chief among those announcements were new RTX 3080 Ti and 3070 Ti mobile

value.title: Intel's Mobileye unveils a chip that could bring self-driving cars to the masses
value.excerpt: Self-driving car technology is currently limited to test programs and specialized vehicles, but Mobileye thinks it can play a key role in making driverless vehicles you can actually buy. The Intel-owned company has unveiled an EyeQ Ultra system-on-chip designed with consumer self-driving cars in mind.

value.title: Intel launches its Arc graphics chips for PC gaming
value.excerpt: Intel aims to disrupt the duopoly of Nvidia and Advanced Micro Devices with its own Arc standalone graphics chips launching today.

value.title: With Intel Mobileye’s newest chip, automakers can bring automated driving to cars
value.excerpt: Intel subsidiary Mobileye is plans to bring a new supercomputer to market designed to give passenger cars, trucks and SUVs autonomous driving powers. The company introduced Tuesday at the 2022 CES tech trade show a new system-on-chip called EyeQ Ultra that is purpose-built for autonomous driving.

value.title: Inspur Information Identified as a Strong Performer in AI Infrastructure Report
value.excerpt: Inspur Information, a leading IT infrastructure solutions provider, announced today that Forrester, a leading global research company, released The Forrester Wave™: AI Infrastructure, Q4 2021, which identified Inspur Information as a Strong Performer and recognized its full-stack AI solutions.
